 Talk How to Activate the Dark Theme on Opera Browser   
 Do you like using a dark theme on your browser? Opera is available in light and dark colours. With a few quick clicks, you can enable the dark mode and make the screen easier on your eyes. 
 Steps Edit 
 Method One of Two: From the Start Page Edit 
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/4\/42\/Opera-shortcut.png\/460px-Opera-shortcut.png","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/4\/42\/Opera-shortcut.png","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":300.13736263736,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":495.87912087912} 
 1 
 Open Opera.  Make sure that you are using the  latest version  of Opera browser.
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/8\/8b\/Opera%3B-start-page-customization.png\/459px-Opera%3B-start-page-customization.png","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/8\/8b\/Opera%3B-start-page-customization.png\/759px-Opera%3B-start-page-customization.png","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":298.87362637363,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":493.79120879121} 
 2 
 Click on the start page customization icon.  You can find it in the top-right corner.
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/1\/1f\/Opera-dark-theme.png\/460px-Opera-dark-theme.png","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/1\/1f\/Opera-dark-theme.png\/760px-Opera-dark-theme.png","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":300.13736263736,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":495.87912087912} 
 3 
 Select "Dark" from the Themes. 
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/e\/e0\/Dark-Theme-on-Opera.png\/459px-Dark-Theme-on-Opera.png","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/e\/e0\/Dark-Theme-on-Opera.png\/759px-Dark-Theme-on-Opera.png","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":256.53846153846,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":423.84615384615} 
 4 
 Enjoy your browsing with the dark theme! 
 Advertisement 
 Method Two of Two: From the Opera Settings Edit 
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/4\/4b\/Operea%3B-settings.png\/459px-Operea%3B-settings.png","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/4\/4b\/Operea%3B-settings.png\/759px-Operea%3B-settings.png","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":255.90659340659,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":422.8021978022} 
 1 
 Open Settings in the  latest version  of Opera.  Click on  Menu  in the left corner and select  Settings  from the list.
 Alternatively, you can press  Alt + P  on your keyboard to open the Settings page. 
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/8\/81\/Opera-Browser-Settings.png\/460px-Opera-Browser-Settings.png","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/8\/81\/Opera-Browser-Settings.png\/760px-Opera-Browser-Settings.png","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":259.06593406593,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":428.02197802198} 
 2 
 Click on "Browser" from the left side. 
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/7\/78\/Enable-dark-theme%3B-Opera.png\/460px-Enable-dark-theme%3B-Opera.png","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/7\/78\/Enable-dark-theme%3B-Opera.png\/760px-Enable-dark-theme%3B-Opera.png","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":253.37912087912,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":418.62637362637} 
 3 
 Scroll down to "User interface. " Check the  Enable dark theme  box.
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/9\/9a\/Activate-the-Dark-Theme-on-Opera.png\/459px-Activate-the-Dark-Theme-on-Opera.png","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/9\/9a\/Activate-the-Dark-Theme-on-Opera.png\/759px-Activate-the-Dark-Theme-on-Opera.png","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":258.43406593407,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":426.97802197802} 
 4 
 Enjoy your dark view!
